sentences.sentence: I did not have any intimation that he was going to resign.
sentences.translation: 我没发现任何他要辞职的暗示。

sentences.sentence: There was no intimation from his doctor that his condition was serious.
sentences.translation: 他的医生没有透露他的病情很严重。

sentences.sentence: He was good-looking, with dark eyes which could smoulder with just the right intimation of passion.
sentences.translation: 他长得很帅，黑色的眼睛只要遇到恰当的激情暗示就会放电。
